FatesWhisper.title: Квест Fate's Whisper
FatesWhisper.1.1: From Maestro Reorin we go to the cemetery. This is where we need to kill
FatesWhisper.1.2: . Or wait until they kill him for us. After his death
FatesWhisper.1.3: a Coffer of the Dead chest will appear. Talk to him - get Reiria's Soul Orb.
FatesWhisper.1.4: Attention: the chest will stand for 1-3 minutes.
FatesWhisper.2.3: . We need to kill three raid bosses and get their sceptres. Similar to the first, the main thing is to talk to the chest after they are soaked, and it will be!
FatesWhisper.2.91: After that we should have three souvenirs: Hallate's Infernium Scepter, Kernon's Infernium Scepter and Golkonda's Infernium Scepter.
FatesWhisper.3.1: Bringing back this scepters to Maestro
FatesWhisper.3.2: . But of course that's not all...
FatesWhisper.4.3: . He will give us Infernium Varnish.
FatesWhisper.5.1: Bringing this Infernium Varnish to Maestro
FatesWhisper.6.3: in the forge. From him we get Maestro Reorin's Hammer.
FatesWhisper.7.2: and give him Maestro Reorin's Hammer.
FatesWhisper.8.1: This time he asks us to take Maestro Reorin's Mold in
FatesWhisper.8.3: , at the weapons store. He will say that he sold it to Master Kaspar, who is in Hardin's Private Academy.
FatesWhisper.9.2: . Kaspar agrees to give it up in exchange for a favor and will offer you the choice of going to Baium or recoloring 30 White Fabric into 30 Blood Stained Cloth in ToI.
FatesWhisper.9.3: We choose the color of the rags.
FatesWhisper.9.4: This is the easiest and fastest option.
FatesWhisper.10.3: Let's have a bloody Thursday! We kill everything that moves, we kill everything that comes to hand. At the end, we should get 30 wet through, red rags. You can kill them with friends. To cause trembling in the knees on the neighboring floors. For on many servers, items are given to everyone in the party who has this quest. Even if the one who kills does it for the sake of pleasure and he does not have a quest.
FatesWhisper.11.2: and change the rags to Maestro Reorin's Mold.
FatesWhisper.12.1: Before completing this quest you need
FatesWhisper.12.4: , return Maestro Reorin's Mold to him. He will offer an exchange of weapons of your choice. We return the weapon that we brought (Top B grade weapon). To do this, select it from the list.
FatesWhisper.12.5: If you choose another, you will have to look for it (another).
FatesWhisper.12.6: After that, select the Low A grade weapon that we want to get.
FatesWhisper.12.7: Below is a list of exchange options.
FatesWhisper.13.1: After choosing an A-grade weapon, we receive as a reward
FatesWhisper.13.2: This completes the first of two subclass quests.

MimirsElixir.title: Mimir's Elixir
MimirsElixir.0.1: In order to start the quest, we go to
MimirsElixir.1.2: and take the quest for reagents from him. In addition, he will give us
MimirsElixir.2.4: , and from them in turn you can get: Moonstone Shard, Volcanic Ash, Quicksilver, Lava Stone. We send them to the forefathers until we receive:
MimirsElixir.2.5: Or we buy all these ingredients where the price suits us.
MimirsElixir.3.3: . In it we will make the key ingredients.
MimirsElixir.3.4: To do this, we put in
MimirsElixir.3.5: , then the reagent, then the catalyst. Then set the desired temperature and start the brew. The temperature determines the chance of success and the number of items as a result of cooking. The higher it is, the more items can be cooked, but the chance that we will burn everything and get nothing also increases. At temperature
MimirsElixir.3.6: chance 100%, quantity x1. We will use it.
MimirsElixir.3.7: Attention, in the future, when brewing Mimir's Elixir itself, you must use the highest Fenix temperature. This is determined by the quest, otherwise you will have to do it again.
MimirsElixir.5.1: Cook Pure Silver, then go up to the 4th floor to Magister
MimirsElixir.5.3: . He says that this is not enough for him and sends us to Magister Joan.
MimirsElixir.6.3: . She is happy and giggles enigmatically.
MimirsElixir.7.2: . We need to extract the item from
MimirsElixir.7.3: . Despite the fact that the mob will not be happy with this news, we extract it.
MimirsElixir.8.4: and we give back what we got. She gives us in return
MimirsElixir.9.3: . We show him True Gold, he is happy, rubbing his hands. passion in the eyes...
MimirsElixir.10.1: Ladd sent us to Watcher's Tomb to kill
MimirsElixir.10.2: . Be careful, the mobs are social, they can throw an anchor. We kill - we get
MimirsElixir.11.4: Be sure to select this temperature. Mix and get
MimirsElixir.12.4: He can not hide the excitement, noticeably in a hurry somewhere. Gives you the ability to learn subclasses and flees in an unknown direction. A strange dullness can be heard throughout Ivory Tower, as if everyone is running somewhere. You do not understand this excitement, but you are happy that you helped them and got what you came for yourself.
MimirsElixir.12.5: Congratulations, you've completed the subclass quest!
